TopicTitle: Took the money, got the email but no link to download.birthday present for my son

Articles.Content:
I purchased Kerbals yesterday.  I saw the Paypal transaction go through immediately and the confirmation email arrived in seconds.

The product does not show up for download when I log into my account and look under Products Purchased.  No products show up there.

I have sent a couple of emails hoping for a quick resolution.  Today is my son's birthday and Kerbals is all he asked for.  We were going to play together and eat pizza for his choice of activities for this evening.  

I'd rather not have to tell him that your system took the money and failed to send out a download link so no games.

Please fix asap.

Order information below:

Order ID: 333759
Product: Kerbal Space Program - 24 USD, 1 copy
Amount: 24 USD

You purchsed the game at our store, right?

We're looking into it already.

BR

It should be working now, let us know if you were able to redeem your download.

Cheers!
A couple of off-topic replies have been removed.
